Title: Lone Wolf McQuade
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Romance, Thriller, Western
Writer: B.J. Nelson (screenplay), H. Kaye Dyal (story), B.J. Nelson (story)
Actors: Chuck Norris, David Carradine, Barbara Carrera, Leon Isaac Kennedy
Plot: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.
